name: T.G. Blade Blaster
effectText:
1 Tuner Synchro Monster + 1+ non-Tuner Synchro Monsters
When your opponent activates a Spell/Trap Card that targets this face-up card (Quick Effect): You can send 1 card from your hand to the GY; negate the effect. Once per turn, during your opponent's turn (Quick Effect): You can banish 1 "T.G." monster from your GY; banish this face-up card on the field. During the next Standby Phase after this card was banished by this effect: Special Summon this card.
